typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{OrderID|CustomerID|OrderDate|ShipDate|TotalCost|CreatedDate|UpdatedDate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouthridgeOrders
SouthridgeOrders sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
